title: Breaking Up Is Hard to Do: Part One
description:
Amy Chan’s love life didn’t go according to plan — and it was a hurt that wouldn’t go away. But that breakup would be the shake-up her life needed to make a change for the better... for her and the broken-hearted she helps to find a brand new start. 

Buy Amy’s book, Breakup Bootcamp: The Science of Rewiring Your Heart 

Learn more about Renew Breakup Bootcamp
